::KitKat::

She looked at Cyber Claw and kept a warm, friendly expression on her 
face. But  by the look of Cyber Claw, something was up.  Her insticts 
told her not to trust this one, and she wasn't going to trust any of 
Aracnia's group untill they proved to be loyal. But after what 
happened with Phobia, she was having serious doubts about her own 
troops.  Right now, she had to play her cards right. "Very well, we 
shall wait for Black Aracnia to arrive. I hope this allience will 
work out. Just think of the possabilities of it all.  All the 
predacons unite, and together, we can crush the maximals. Wouldn't it 
be glorious?"  She smiled at the thought.  "Although, I think instead 
of one ruler, a council will be needed.  What do you think my new 
friend?"

She tried to appear open and welcome them into her pack. But she 
really was waiting to see what trap they were laying for her.  As a 
leader,she knew that everyone would gun her down any chance they 
could get.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Cyber Claw:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Cyber Claw glared at KitKat. "Perhaps she will be here soon. I got 
> here early."
